# User Guide

Welcome to the GNS3 Copilot User Guide. This section provides comprehensive documentation to help you get started and make the most of GNS3 Copilot.

## Getting Started

If you're new to GNS3 Copilot, we recommend starting with these guides:

1. **[FAQ](FAQ.md)** - Frequently Asked Questions
2. **[LLM Quick Configuration Guide](llm-quick-configuration-guide.md)** - Setting up your LLM provider
3. **[Checkpoint Import/Export Guide](checkpoint-import-export-guide.md)** - Managing conversation checkpoints

## Available Documentation

### FAQ
- [FAQ (English)](FAQ.md) - Common questions and answers
- [常见问题 (中文)](FAQ_ZH.md) - 常见问题解答

### Configuration Guides
- [LLM Quick Configuration Guide (English)](llm-quick-configuration-guide.md) - Configure LLM providers
- [LLM 快速配置指南 (中文)](llm-quick-configuration-guide_ZH.md) - 配置 LLM 提供商

### Data Management
- [Checkpoint Import/Export Guide (English)](checkpoint-import-export-guide.md) - Backup and restore conversation history
- [Checkpoint 导入导出指南 (中文)](checkpoint-import-export-guide_ZH.md) - 备份和恢复对话历史

## Quick Reference

### Supported LLM Providers

| Provider | Status |
|----------|--------|
| OpenAI | ✅ |
| DeepSeek | ✅ |
| Anthropic (Claude) | ✅ |
| XAI (Grok) | ✅ |
| Google (Gemini) | ✅ |
| OpenRouter | ✅ |
| Ollama | ✅ |

### Supported Network Devices

| Vendor | Supported Operations |
|--------|---------------------|
| Cisco IOS/IOS-XE | Configuration, Display Commands |
| Huawei VRP | Configuration, Display Commands |
| Juniper JunOS | Configuration, Display Commands |
| Arista EOS | Configuration, Display Commands |
| H3C | Configuration, Display Commands |
| VPCS | Configuration via Telnetlib3 |
| Linux | Configuration via Netmiko |

### Getting Help

- **GitHub Issues**: Report bugs or request features at [github.com/yueguobin/gns3-copilot/issues](https://github.com/yueguobin/gns3-copilot/issues)
- **Project Documentation**: Visit our [GitHub Pages site](https://yueguobin.github.io/gns3-copilot/) for more information
